participant_1.background:
I am excited to start a new chapter of my life with my fiance.
my favorite movie is dirty harry.
i am from germany.
I watch Face Off with my husband in our spare time.
i want to be a librarian.

participant_2.background:
My hands were always greasy from working on cars.
I showed a group of tourists the best spots to view the Grand Canyon.
I am a student who is trying to quit smoking for the sake of my baby.
I love to play soccer in the park because it is a great way to stay active and connect with my friends.
Last year I moved into a new home that perfectly fit my needs.

content.text: Hi!  I just got engaged to my fiance last week!  I am so excited!
Congratulations!  I am getting married next month!
Thank you!  Where are you getting married?
In the Grand Canyon!  I am so excited to see it!
Wow, that sounds amazing!  I have never been to the Grand Canyon.
You should go!  It is absolutely beautiful!
I will have to put it on my list!  What do you like to do for fun?
I love to play soccer, and I also love to go hiking.
That sounds fun!  I used to play soccer in high school, but I haven't played in a while.
You should start playing again!  It is a great way to stay active.
I might have to!  Do you have any other hobbies?
I also like to watch movies and TV shows.
Me too!  What are some of your favorite movies?
I love Dirty Harry!  It is such a classic movie.
I love that movie too!  It is so much fun!
What are some of your favorite TV shows?
I love Face Off!  It is so suspenseful and exciting.
I have never seen that show!  What is it about?
It is about a team of plastic surgeons who compete to create the best facial reconstructions.
That sounds really interesting!  I will have to check it out!
You should!  It is a great show.
